channel.title: Multi-lingual on Satellite
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-lingual on Satellite

item.title: Open-Source Dashboard
item.description: This is a list, a kind of dashboard displaying all of my actively maintained open-source projects. The dashboard shows the last version of a project. It links to the source code repository and usually also to the packages. It shows also the state of the automated tests. Ansible roles List of Ansible roles and collections. https://img.shields.io/ansible/role/d/monolithprojects Role name Version Downloads Issues Pull requests github_actions_runner hashicorp_tools hassio homebrew http_proxy_client [ kasm_server [ system_update [ tfvars2facts user_management [ rke2 nexus_config Collection name Linting Action Releaseing Action Issues Pull requests wireguard Docker-compose List of docker-compose projects.
